response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the top cabinet. The next step is to take the platter out of the top cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the burger out of the fridge
(3) Heat the burger

response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
